plays.text: Goal scored by Alex Zhamnov assisted by Tony Amonte and Alexander Karpovtsev
Penalty to Jaroslav Spacek 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Manny Malhotra

Penalty to Jaroslav Spacek 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Jaroslav Spacek assisted by Tony Amonte and Alexander Karpovtsev
Penalty to Richard Matvichuk 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Eric Daze
Penalty to Tyler Arnason 2 minutes for High Sticking Jim Montgomery
Goal scored by Derian Hatcher assisted by Brent Gilchrist and John MacLean
